meanings.definition: Redevelopers: People or companies who renovate or improve existing buildings or areas.
meanings.sent1: The redevelopers worked hard to revitalize the old neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Many redevelopers are investing in the downtown area to make it more modern.
meanings.sent3: The redevelopers joked that they were like modern-day urban architects.
meanings.sent4: The redevelopers were like artists, painting new life onto old structures.
meanings.sent5: The redevelopers transformed the rundown buildings into vibrant spaces.

meanings.definition: Redevelopers: The act of renovating or improving existing buildings or areas.
meanings.sent1: The redevelopers' dedication to their work was evident in the beautifully restored buildings.
meanings.sent2: The redevelopers' project brought new life to the once neglected area.
meanings.sent3: The redevelopers' enthusiasm for their job was contagious among the community.
meanings.sent4: The redevelopers' efforts were like a breath of fresh air for the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The redevelopers' vision transformed the old town into a bustling hub.
